channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Joan Kennedy, Who Married Into a Political Dynasty, Dies at 89
item.description: The wife of Senator Ted Kennedy for a quarter of a century, she both basked and struggled in the reflected glare of a family constantly in the spotlig...

item.title: Trump Says Chicago Mayor and Illinois Governor Should Be Jailed Amid National Guard Tensions
item.description: In an early morning Truth Social post, the president said Gov. JB Pritzker of Illinois and Mayor Brandon Johnson of Chicago should be jailed for faili...

item.title: Deutsche Bank and Jeffrey Epstein’s ghost
item.description: Given its long history of servicing high-risk clients, it is perhaps unsurprising that Deutsche Bank stepped in when Epstein was ditched by JPMorgan.

item.title: Section 230 protected social media companies from legal responsibility for misinformation. AI chatbots could be about to change that.
item.description: Section 230's liability protections may not apply to AI chatbot outputs, legal experts say.

item.title: Stablecoin startup Coinflow raises $25 million to challenge Stripe
item.description: Pantera Capital led the round, with participation from Reciprocal Ventures, Coinbase Ventures, Jump Capital, and CMT Digital.

item.title: Nobel Prize in Chemistry Awarded to Architects of Metal-Organic Frameworks
item.description: The prize was awarded to Susumu Kitagawa, Richard Robson and Omar Yaghi for the development of a new type of molecular architecture.

item.title: ‘Let’s trust consumers and stop this hot dog populism’: European politicians up in arms over vote to ban ‘steak’ and ‘meat’ reference to veggie protein
item.description: "A beef tomato doesn’t contain any beef ... Ladies’ fingers are not made of actual ladies’ fingers,” Austrian MEP Anna Stürgkh said.

item.title: Justin Pearson, Tennessee Democrat Known for Activism, to Run for Congress
item.description: Mr. Pearson, a member of the Tennessee House of Representatives since 2023, will challenge U.S. Representative Steve Cohen, a fellow Democrat.

item.title: Trump jokes about a U.S.-Canada ‘merger’ as he reaches a trade deal and predicts a wave of southbound tourists
item.description: “The people of Canada, they will love us again,” Trump said despite relations hitting a historical low point. “Most of them still do ... I think they ...

item.title: Israel Intercepts More Gaza-Bound Activist Boats
item.description: The Israeli military intercepted a nine-boat flotilla aiming to break Israel’s naval blockade of Gaza to deliver aid. The Israeli Foreign Ministry sai...

item.title: 4 Workers Die in Collapse at Hotel Site in Madrid
item.description: The authorities initially thought the workers might be trapped after the collapse on Tuesday, but their bodies were recovered from the rubble overnigh...

item.title: Israel Intercepts Another Activist Flotilla That Aimed to Break Gaza Blockade
item.description: It was the second attempt in as many weeks to breach the restrictions around the Gaza Strip. Neither have succeeded.

item.title: How Nepal’s Gen Z Revolution Spiraled Out of Control
item.description: Young people in Nepal rose up against corruption and inequality. But they say they did not expect the bloodshed, arson and government downfall that fo...

item.title: Israel Intercepts Another Activist Flotilla That Aimed to Break Gaza Blockade
item.description: It was the second attempt in as many weeks to breach the restrictions around the Gaza Strip. Neither have succeeded.

item.title: At UK’s Conservative Party Conference, Tories Wonder About Their Future
item.description: The once dominant British political party has been outflanked by Reform, a right-wing populist rival. At the Tory annual conference, attendance was sp...
